product_summary: Onfido's Real Identity Platform combines a global suite of identity verifications and signals into an easy-to-use orchestration studio. It allows businesses to onboard more customers, navigate compliance, prevent fraud, and reduce costs. The platform is powered by fast, fair, and accurate AI, making it a valuable tool for businesses of all sizes.
product_pros: Global suite of identity verifications and signals
product_cons: Can be expensive for small businesses
Can be complex to set up
May not be suitable for all businesses
May not be able to prevent all types of fraud
May not be able to detect all types of identity theft

product_usecases.details: Onfido's Real Identity Platform can be used to onboard new customers quickly and easily. The platform's AI-powered identity verification technology can help businesses verify the identity of their customers in real-time, reducing the risk of fraud and identity theft.

Onfido's Real Identity Platform can help businesses comply with KYC and AML regulations. The platform's global suite of identity verifications and signals can help businesses verify the identity of their customers in accordance with the latest regulations.
Onfido's Real Identity Platform can help businesses prevent fraud. The platform's AI-powered fraud detection technology can help businesses identify and block fraudulent transactions in real-time.

Onfido's Real Identity Platform can help businesses reduce costs. The platform's automated identity verification and fraud detection technology can help businesses reduce the cost of manual processes and reduce the risk of fraud.

Onfido's Real Identity Platform can help businesses improve the customer experience. The platform's easy-to-use interface and fast, fair, and accurate AI can help businesses create a seamless and convenient onboarding experience for their customers.
